title: TE Knox Baird et al. v. Grace Presbytery
parties: TE Knox Baird et al. v. Grace Presbytery
source: Case 2023-06: TE Knox Baird et al. v. Grace Presbytery, M51GA, 2024, 2060-2073
tags: Complaints, Judicial Commission, Due Process, Session, Authority of, Presbytery, Authority of, Review and Control, Judicial Procedure, Evidence, Session, Presbytery
summary: These cases came before the SJC on the Complaints of TE Knox Baird and several other members of the Session of First Presbyterian Church of Hattiesburg, Mississippi (“FPCH”) against Grace Presbytery (“GP”) arising out of actions by GP in response to multiple requests for review or investigation of actions by the Session of FPCH (“the Session”).
